attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2013-0068

Date: 2013-01-31

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to paragraph 153(1)(d) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, fixes the remuneration of Noeline Sujithra Paul, a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), for the period she is acting as Assistant Deputy Chairperson, at the rate set out in the attached schedule, which salary is within the range GCQ 4 ($121,700 - $143,100), commencing on August 7, 2012 and until such time as an Assistant Deputy Chairperson is designated.


Sur recommandation du premier ministre et en vertu de l’alinéa 153(1)d) de la Loi sur l’immigration et la protection des réfugiés, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil fixe la rémunération de Noeline Sujithra Paul, commissaire à temps plein de la Commission de l'immigration et du statut de réfugié (Bureau régional de Toronto), pour la période pendant laquelle elle agit à titre de vice-présidente adjointe, conformément à l’annexe ci-jointe, lequel traitement se situe dans l = échelle GCQ 4 (121 700 $ - 143 100 $), commençant le 7 août 2012 et jusqu’à ce qu’un vice-président adjoint soit nommé.

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to paragraph 153(1)(d) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, fixes the remuneration of Noeline Sujithra Paul, a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), for the period she is acting as Assistant Deputy Chairperson, at the rate set out in the attached schedule, which salary is within the range GCQ 4 ($121,700 - $143,100), commencing on August 7, 2012 and until such time as an Assistant Deputy Chairperson is designated.

=
échelle GCQ 4 (121 700 $ - 143 100 $), commençant le 7 août 2012 et jusqu’à ce qu’un vice-président adjoint soit nommé.
